verses.roman:
'ātmā'-śabde 'yatna' kahe--yatna kariyā
"munayo 'pi" kṛṣṇa bhaje guṇākṛṣṭa hañā

synonyms: ātmā-śabde—by the word ātmā; yatna—endeavor; kahe—one means; yatna kariyā—by great endeavor; munayaḥ api—even great saintly persons; kṛṣṇa bhaje—take to the devotional service of Kṛṣṇa; guṇa-ākṛṣṭa hañā—being attracted by His transcendental qualities.
translation: "Ātmā also means 'endeavor.' Being attracted by Kṛṣṇa's transcendental qualities, some saints make a great endeavor to come to the point of rendering service to Him.
